reviews.review_msg: Professor Carlos is a fantastic professor he truly cares about his students. He is always spending time outside class hours, even on weekends, willing to help students some more. Dedicated professor. I would take him again if I could.

Professor Carlos is an amazing instructor who knows what he is talking about, and understands what is important if you want a job. I have had him twice and would take him again. Projects and weekly work are fair but you have to work to get an A. Very flexible person. Nice person.

Good lecturer, clear, energetic, nice jokes. Big fan of practical case studies, which I like. I enjoy his lectures. Took another class with him and he was good also. The most VERY likable person, good personality. Worth going to talk to for anything.
Great professor! Genuinely cares about his students' success and provides real-world practically in his lectures.
This professor knows little in his major so his teaching technique is to let students do lots lots of presentation. Suck!

I wanted to post a blank page for his exams since that was how much he taught us. Truly he is smart how else might I justify "teaching" a class for two weeks and telling stories and using cases from the internet. I am grateful to him as he helped me understand the meaning of the word "hypocrisy". You wont learn but you will enjoy a standup show

He's one of the best professors in finance out there. First, he's got industry experience and second, he's shrewd and smart. There's a lot in him worth looking up to. His course is entirely application based and that's why it's very engaging. You're never going to get bored in his class. Just make sure to read/study the cases.

He is the best finance prof ever, although he is sooo rude in the very first class. As long as you read before class and really participate in the class, you will learn a lot for sure. He will always open to questions and answer these questions patiently. Be prepared he will go after you if you check you phone during the lecture.
Best prof ever, don't think the other student who scored him know what it's about.

He gives many papers to read. Then in class he is a showman, just talk and relate stories. You absolutely learn nothing from his class. You leave the semester with realizing that you waste your time in that course. He mistaken the school and class with military camp and students with soldiers. Treat students like they worth nothing.

This is the worst teacher of my education career. I have never had a teacher as bad as this one. I had the Bus866 in Fall2014 and that was my worst nightmare. The course is easy, but he is so disrespectful towards students. He make you sit in the class and control your attendance. If you have to leave (washroom), he might not let you!
